entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning except 50 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 21 April 2023
